comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: Mponda was a Yao chief whose village was on the west bank of the Shire just north of the present town of Mangochi, formerly Fort Johnston.  The original Fort Johnston was built on the east bank opposite Mponda's during a campaign by Harry Johnston to subdue Yao slave traders.  Mponda's was later the site of a well-known U.M.C.A. mission.
